NK015(ba)005:0: snga 'gyur rnying lugs kyi bla ma brgyud pa'i gsol
NK015(ba)005:1: 'debs gzhan phan mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs so
NK015(ba)005:2: // phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i zhing khams shar nyon mongs pa thams cad bskyod pa //
NK015(ba)005:3: lhor mun pa mun nag gi tshogs bcom pa nub
NK015(ba)005:4: yul phebs pa byang spobs ba can shar lho rtag
NK015(ba)005:5: tu snang ba // lho nub gser gyi dra bas
NK015(ba)005:6: g.yogs pa nub byang dag rab gnas mngon par 'phags
NK015(ba)005:7: pa byang shar bdud bcom kyi sde /
NK015(ba)005:8: steng dmigs pa med pa la yid byed pa can /
NK015(ba)005:10: / 'og thams cad kyis yon tan brgyan pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)005:11: bde gshegs rjes su sbyongs ba sems dang po bskyed
NK015(ba)005:12: pa yid la mdzad pa rnam grangs bsnyengs ba dang
NK015(ba)005:13: bag tsha ba dang bral ba /
NK015(ba)005:14: mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang //
NK015(ba)005:15: khon dang rgyags pa rnam par gnon pa rin chen
NK015(ba)005:16: gzugs bkod 'od snang phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo
NK015(ba)005:17: 'byung ba'i dpal // gdugs 'phags byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba bdud dang yid gnyis kun bcom //
NK015(ba)005:18: skrag med mun bral ting 'dzin mngon 'phags rgyal po
NK015(ba)005:19: the tshom sems bskyed gcod mdzad nyon mongs skyod phyag
NK015(ba)005:20: 'tshal // sangs rgyas rnam gzigs gtsug tor thams cad skyobs /
NK015(ba)005:22: / 'khor ba 'jig dang gser thub 'od srung mar me mdzad kyang zer dang //
NK015(ba)005:23: sh+aakya thub pa byams pa mgon po sogs //
NK015(ba)005:24: dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)005:25: mdo sde dbyangs bsnyad lung bstan tshigs bcad dang //
NK015(ba)005:26: ched brjod gleng gzhi rtogs brjod de ltar byung //
NK015(ba)005:27: skyes rabs rgyas dang rmad byung gtan dbab ste //
NK015(ba)005:28: gsung rabs yan lag bcu gnyis la phyag 'tshal //
NK015(ba)005:29: byang chub phyogs chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang //
NK015(ba)005:30: mthar gnas dgu dang rnam par thar pa brgyad //
NK015(ba)005:31: zil gnon zad par stobs dbang ma 'dres gzungs //
NK015(ba)005:32: mi 'jigs bzhi sogs rtogs chos la phyag 'tshal //
NK015(ba)005:33: lum+b+hi'i tshal dang byang chub shing gi drung //
NK015(ba)005:34: l+b+aa r+aa na si lha las babs pa'i gnas //
NK015(ba)005:35: mnyan yod rgyal po'i khab dang yang pa can //
NK015(ba)005:36: r+ts+wa mchog grong ste gnas brgyad la phyag 'tshal //
NK015(ba)005:37: der bzhugs bkra 1shis 'byung sgo mang yang zer /
NK015(ba)005:39: byang 2chen pad spung yang zer chos 'khor 3lha babs 4cho 5'phrul bdud 'dul yang zer /
NK015(ba)005:41: dbyen 6bzlum byams dngos byin rlabs rnam rgyal dang //
NK015(ba)005:42: myang 'das mchod rten brgyad la phyag /
NK015(ba)005:43: ka dag gdod ma'i chos sku kun tu bzang //
NK015(ba)005:44: lhun grub longs spyod rdzogs sku rigs lnga'i gtso /
NK015(ba)005:46: / 'gro 'dul sprul sku sh+aakya seng ge sogs //
NK015(ba)005:47: sku gsum ston pa rnams la gsol ba /
NK015(ba)005:49: / 'jam dbyang phyag na rdo rje spyan ras gzigs //
NK015(ba)005:50: sa yi snying po sgriib pa rnam par sel //
NK015(ba)005:51: nam mkha'i snying po byams pa kun tu bzang //
NK015(ba)005:52: nye ba'i sras chen brgyad la grags ldan mchog skyong gnod sbyin skar mda' gdong //
NK015(ba)005:53: blo gros thabs ldan klu rgyal 'jog po dang //
NK015(ba)005:54: dri med grags pa nyid de dam pa yi //
NK015(ba)005:55: rigs can d+r+wa ma lnga la sh+aa ri'i bu sogs nyan thos mchog brgyad dang //
NK015(ba)005:56: sgra gcan 'dzin sogs gnas brtan bcu drug ste //
NK015(ba)005:57: dge slong dang ni dge bsnyen pha mar bcas //
NK015(ba)005:58: thun mong 'khor rnam bzhi la gsol 'od srung kun dga' bo dang sh+aa na'i gos //
NK015(ba)005:59: nye sbas d+hi d+hi ka dang nag po pa //
NK015(ba)005:60: legs mthong chen po nyid de thub dbang gi //
NK015(ba)005:61: bstan pa'i gtad rabs bdun la dga' rab rdo rje in+d+ra b+hu ti dang //
NK015(ba)005:62: sa ra ha sogs grub chen brgya cu bzhi /
NK015(ba)005:64: / 'jam dpal sh+r+ai seng dz+nya na su tra ste /
NK015(ba)005:66: / 'das rjes thob pa gsum la 'phags mchog klu sgrub ar+ya de ba dang //
NK015(ba)005:67: thogs med dbyig gnyen phyogs glang chos grags te /
NK015(ba)005:69: / 'dzam gling mdzes rgyan drug dang rmad byung gnyis //
NK015(ba)005:70: chen po bzhi dang bcas la gsol h'u mdzad ng+ha na sam skri many+dzu sh+r+ai /
NK015(ba)005:71: klu dbang bi ma la dang rom bu gu //
NK015(ba)005:72: pra b+ha ha sti shin+tam gar+b+ha ste //
NK015(ba)005:73: grub pa'i rig 'dzin brgyad la gsol ba rgyal kun 'dus zhal sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes //
NK015(ba)005:74: mkhan chen byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba 'tsho //
NK015(ba)005:75: pad+ma'i ka ma sh+r+ai la mchan ngang tshul smirti dz+ny+aa na sogs //
NK015(ba)005:76: snga 'gyur pan chen brgya rtsar gsol spyan ras gzigs dbang srong btsan mi yi lha /
NK015(ba)005:78: / 'jam dpal dbyangs dngos khri srong lde'u btsan //
NK015(ba)005:79: gsang ba'i bdag po khri lde'u gtsug brtan te //
NK015(ba)005:80: chos rgyal mes dbon gsum la gangs can mig gcig thu mi sam+b+ho ta //
NK015(ba)005:81: skal ldan snying gi bu dgu rje 'bangs grogs //
NK015(ba)005:82: ska cog zhang dang rma gnyags rong zom sogs //
NK015(ba)005:83: sgra bsgyur lo ts+aa brgya rtsar gsol rbart+na dpal dbyangs
NK015(ba)005:84: ye shes dbang po rnam snang mdzad bee ro tsa
NK015(ba)005:85: na // rgyal ba'i byang chub rma ban rin chen mchog /
NK015(ba)005:86: ngan lam rgyal mchog dbyangs dang klu dbang srung /
NK015(ba)005:88: / 'dul 'dzin sad mi bdun la gnubs gnyags zur te bstan pa'i babs so gsum //
NK015(ba)005:89: nyang ban ldang ma lce btsun zhang yab sras //
NK015(ba)005:90: me long ku ma r+aa dza klong chen sogs //
NK015(ba)005:91: rdzogs chen brgyud 'dzin rnams la rma g.yo gtsang gsum dgongs pa rab gsal dang //
NK015(ba)005:92: klu mes tshul khrems shes rab la sogs pa //
NK015(ba)005:93: dbus gtsang mi bcu nas brgyud snga 'gyur gyi //
NK015(ba)005:94: bstan rtsa so thar brgyud par gsol ba 'debs //
NK015(ba)005:96: chos 'khor gsum du klog pa'i 'khor lo rdzogs //
NK015(ba)005:98: sgrub gnas gsum du spong ba bsam gtan dang //
NK015(ba)005:99: bya ba las kyi 'khor los sa gsum gyi /
NK015(ba)005:101: / 'gro 'dren mkhas grub rnams la gzhan yang gter ston mchog gling gter phran brgya //
NK015(ba)005:102: mngal ri pan chen pra dz+ny+aa rasmi'i zhabs //
NK015(ba)005:103: brgyud tshul kun 'dus gter bdag gling ba dang //
NK015(ba)005:104: chos dpal rgya mtsho sogs la de bzhin dam gtsang byams gsum nas brgyud pa'i //
NK015(ba)005:105: mkhas grub rim byon rnams dang de las gzhan //
NK015(ba)005:106: pad+ma rig 'dzin mkhyen brtse'i 'od zer sogs //
NK015(ba)005:107: bstan 'dzin dam pa rnams la mdor na skyes bu zung bzhi ya brgyad dang //
NK015(ba)005:108: sa bcu lam lnga'i spang rtogs yon tan la //
NK015(ba)005:109: dbang bsgyur theg pa gsum dang grub mtha' bzhi'i //
NK015(ba)005:110: srol 'byed dge 'dun nyi shur de ltar kun bzang spyod pa rgya mtsho yis //
NK015(ba)005:111: rtag tu gzhan la phan pa lhur mdzad pa'i //
NK015(ba)005:112: thub dbang sras dang bcas pa'i zhal skyen mchog /
NK015(ba)005:113: 'khor lo'i dbang phyug rnams byin rlabs rtsa ba dpal ldan bla ma dang //
NK015(ba)005:114: dngos grub rtsa ba yi dam zhi khro'i lha //
NK015(ba)005:115: bar chad sel ba'i rtsa ba mkha' 'gro'i tshogs //
NK015(ba)005:116: chos skyong srung mar bcas la 'di nas bzung ste tshe rabs thams cad du //
NK015(ba)005:117: ngan song gsum sogs mi khom gnas spangs te //
NK015(ba)005:118: dal ba'i rten la bshes gnyen mchog bsten nas //
NK015(ba)005:119: dkon mchog rin chen gsum de'i rjes 'dzin shog /
NK015(ba)005:120: dge dang mi dge'i las bcu'i blang dor la //
NK015(ba)005:121: ma rmongs rjes dran drug dang bden pa bzhi //
NK015(ba)005:122: rten 'brel tshad med bzhi dang phyin drug gi //
NK015(ba)005:123: lam las byang chub sems gnyis skyed par shog /
NK015(ba)005:124: thos bsam bsgom pas rang rgyud gdul ba dang /
NK015(ba)005:126: / 'chad rtsod rtsom pas bstan la bya ba byed //
NK015(ba)005:127: mkhas btsun bzang pos 'gro phan sgrub pa la //
NK015(ba)005:128: tshe rabs kun tu skyo bar ma gyur cig /
NK015(ba)005:129: phung khams skye mched kyis mtshon shes bya'i gzhir //
NK015(ba)005:130: bdag dang bdag gir lta ba yongs lpangs nas //
NK015(ba)005:131: bdag med rnam gnyis mngon sum rtogs pa yis //
NK015(ba)005:132: srid pa'i phra rgyas ma lus spangs bar shog /
NK015(ba)005:133: khyad par rim pa gnyis kyi rnal 'byor la //
NK015(ba)005:134: brten nas rig 'dzin rnam bzhi rim bsgrod de //
NK015(ba)005:135: mthar thug sku dang ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid //
NK015(ba)005:136: dag pa gnyis ldan mngon du byed par shog /
NK015(ba)005:137: mtha' brgyad spros bral chos sku'i ngang nyid las //
NK015(ba)005:138: nges pa lnga ldan longs spyod rdzogs sku'i rtsal //
NK015(ba)005:139: bzod skye mchog gi sprul pa grangs med kyis //
NK015(ba)005:140: rnam bzhi'i phrin las dpag yas sgrub par shog /
NK015(ba)005:141: mdor na rgyal dang de sras 'phags rnams kyis //
NK015(ba)005:142: gzhan la phan pa'i mdzad bzang lhur bzhes pa'i //
NK015(ba)005:143: smon gnas de kun bdag gis yongs grub nas //
NK015(ba)005:144: mtha' yas 'gro ba srid las sgrol gyur cig /
NK015(ba)005:145: ces pa snga 'gyur rnying lugs kyi bla ma brgyud
NK015(ba)005:146: pa'i gsol 'debs gzhan phan mtha' yas zhes bya ba
NK015(ba)005:147: 'di yang dam pa'i tshul dgus legs par brgyan pa'i
NK015(ba)005:148: / rang slob gnas brtan pad+ma dam chos bzang po
NK015(ba)005:149: nas ji ltar bskul bzhin dang dus kyi skye bo
NK015(ba)005:150: rnams yongs grags kyi brda chad rnam grangs su byas
NK015(ba)005:151: pa dag la'ang rmongs par rigs nas de dag la
NK015(ba)005:152: phan sems kyis kun nas bslangs te /
NK015(ba)005:153: mdo khams kyi btsun pa gzhan phan mtha' yas su
NK015(ba)005:154: 'bod pas ru dam o rgyan bsam gtan chos gling
NK015(ba)005:155: gi yang dben gangs khrod bde ba chen po'i pho
NK015(ba)005:156: brang nas shar mar spel ba dge /
NK015(ba)005:157: rim byon mkhas grub nor bu'i phreng //
NK015(ba)005:159: dad ldan klu rgyal kyis spel bas //
NK015(ba)005:160: gzhan la phan pa mtha'a yas shog /
